vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting a Specific Use Permit for an inside commercial amusement on property zoned Planned Development District No. 7 with a D Liquor Control Overlay and a D-1 Liquor Control Overlay, on the north line of Centerville Road, between Garland Road and Jupiter Road
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to a site plan and conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period with eligibility for automatic renewals for additional five-year periods, subject to a site plan and conditions
Z234-118(LC)
